titlestmt.titleproper: Asian Cultural Council records, Conferences, Festivals and Seminars, RG 2
A Guide to the Asian Cultural Council records, Conferences, Festivals and Seminars, RG 2 FA1400

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-03-13 17:18:58 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Asian Cultural Council records, Conferences, Festivals and Seminars, RG 2

physdesc.extent: 29 letter document boxes, 2 standard record storage boxes, Boxes 249-277, Box 408, 409.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Record Group 2 is arranged in three series:

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Record Group 2 documents conference and seminar planning, conference participants and papers, primarily spanning the 1970s and 1980s. Also represented are a variety of festival files focusing primarily on the Festival of India in the 1980s.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The Rockefeller Archive Center has title, copyright, and literary rights in the collection, in so far as it holds them, and has authority to grant permission to cite and publish archival material from the collection.
